list_definition.definition: a document of identification, necessary for foreign travel

list_ex_of_english: At the present time we are not establishing a general system of passports, but we may have to do so.
The practice relating to the issue of passports to minors will be reviewed when the final form of the proposed legislation is known.
Control is also exercised in the issue of passports.
Besides controlling travel, passports and the like often served to identify political suspects.
We were told that if we wanted to stop people at our frontiers and look at their passports, we could do so.
However, a range of measures, including secure holding areas and early return of sponsors' passports, is being taken to improve performance.
We should move toward real-time verification of passports with issuing authorities.
Even so further initiatives are in place to improve the handling of passports.
